bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: Update setup.sh and setup.bat given new libnd4j structure
bug.description: setup.sh doesn't download/build libnd4j. Running this at present will fail unless the user has manually installed libnd4j separately. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/setup.sh>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/setup.sh</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
